# a [[solution]] of [[sugar]] in [[water]] (sometimes in [[wine]]) used to [[top up]] bottles of [[sparkling wine]] made by the [[Champagne]] method
types.html:
liqueur de dosage f (plural liqueurs de dosage)

  1. a solution of sugar in water (sometimes in wine) used to top up bottles of sparkling wine made by the Champagne method
trans: a solution of sugar in water  used to top up bottles of sparkling wine made by the Champagne method
a solution of sugar in water  used to top up bottles of sparkling wine made by the Champagne method

title: liqueur de dosage
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /li.kœʁ də do.zaʒ/
